com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata

Class ScenarioMarketData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opengamma.strata.engine.marketdata.ScenarioMarketData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bean, ImmutableBean

    public class ScenarioMarketData
extends Object
implements ImmutableBean
    A set of market data used for performing calculations across a set of scenarios.

    • Nested Class Summary

    • Method Detail

      • builder

        public static ScenarioMarketDataBuilder builder(int scenarioCount)
        Returns a mutable builder for building a set of scenario market data.
        Parameters:
        scenarioCount - the number of scenarios
        Returns:
        a mutable builder for building a set of scenario market data

      • builder

        public static ScenarioMarketDataBuilder builder(int scenarioCount,
                                                LocalDate valuationDate)
        Returns a mutable builder for building a set of scenario market data where every scenario has the same valuation date.
        Parameters:
        scenarioCount - the number of scenarios
        valuationDate - the valuation date of all scenarios
        Returns:
        a mutable builder for building a set of scenario market data

      • of

        public static ScenarioMarketData of(BaseMarketData marketData)
        Returns a set of data for a single scenario, taking the data from an instance of BaseMarketData.
        Parameters:
        marketData - a set of data for a single scenario
        Returns:
        a set of scenario data for a single scenario taken from marketData

      • getValues

        public <T> List<T> getValues(MarketDataId<T> id)
        Returns a list of market data values, one from each scenario.

        The date of the market data is the same as the valuation date of the scenario.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the market data
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the market data
        Returns:
        a list of market data values, one from each scenario
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are no values for the specified ID

      • getTimeSeries

        public LocalDateDoubleTimeSeries getTimeSeries(ObservableId id)
        Returns a time series of market data values.

        Time series are not affected by scenarios, therefore there is a single time series for each key which is shared between all scenarios.

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the market data
        Returns:
        a time series of market data values
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no time series for the specified ID

      • getGlobalValue

        public <T> T getGlobalValue(MarketDataId<T> id)
        Returns a single value that is valid for all scenarios.

        This allows optimizations such as pre-processing of items market data to create a single composite value that can be processed more efficiently.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the market data
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the market data
        Returns:
        the market data value
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if there is no value for the specified ID

      • containsValues

        public boolean containsValues(MarketDataId<?> id)
        Returns true if this set of data contains value for the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        id - an ID identifying an item of market data
        Returns:
        true if this set of data contains values for the specified ID

      • containsTimeSeries

        public boolean containsTimeSeries(ObservableId id)
        Returns true if this set of data contains a time series for the specified market data ID.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if this set of data contains a time series for the specified market data ID
